programme.title: Alone
programme.desc: A grief-stricken young widow flees the city to cope with the loss of her husband. When she's kidnapped by a man and locked in a cabin, she escapes into the wilderness and is pursued by her captor.

programme.title: The Abcs Of Death 2
programme.desc: 26 new stories about death from the next generation of genre filmmakers.

programme.title: The Canyon
programme.desc: Honeymooners Nick and Lori head off to the Grand Canyon for adventure and time alone together.

programme.title: Aniara
programme.desc: The human race must leave Earth and begin new on Mars. After takeoff the ship Aniara is damaged beyond repair. As they cope with their new reality passengers begin to lose their sanity.

programme.title: Splinter
programme.desc: Trapped in a gas station by a parasite, a couple and an escaped convict must find a way to survive.

programme.title: Hobo with a Shotgun
programme.desc: A homeless vigilante blows away crooked cops and other scumbags with his trusty pump-action shotgun.

programme.title: Bad Milo
programme.desc: A guy learns that his unusual stomach problems are being caused by a demon living in his intestines.

programme.title: Agnes
programme.desc: A nun’s disturbing behavior sparks rumors of demonic possession at a remote convent. Benjamin, a priest-in-waiting, and his disillusioned mentor, Father Donaghue, are sent to investigate, their methods backfire, leaving a wake of terror and trauma.

programme.title: Body at Brighton Rock
programme.desc: A novice park ranger must spend the night guarding a potential crime scene.

programme.title: Censor
programme.desc: Film censor Enid (Niamh Algar, Wrath of Man) is assigned to review a disturbing film that recalls her childhood memories. She begins to unravel how this eerie work might be tied to the long-ago disappearance of her sister.

programme.title: George A. Romero's Survival of the Dead
programme.desc: Residents fight a zombie epidemic while hoping for a cure to return their relatives back to their human state.

programme.title: Last Shift
programme.desc: A rookie cop's 1st shift in the last night of a closing police station alone turns into a living nightmare.

programme.title: 12 Hour Shift
programme.desc: It's 1999 and a drug-addicted nurse, her scheming cousin and a group of black market organ-trading criminals get caught up in a heist gone wrong. Starring Angela Bettis (“Dexter,” Carrie).

programme.title: Wrinkles the Clown
programme.desc: It started with an online video that went viral. Wrinkles the clown had been hired by parents to scare their misbehaving child. Follow this eerie real-life character.

programme.title: The Signal
programme.desc: A horror film told in three parts from three perspectives, in which a mysterious transmission which invades every cell phone, radio and TV, turning people into killers.
